body: Has anyone else noticed that lately especially on the weekends, there haven't been enough nebula servers to cope with demand. There are 5 servers up now, 5 offline, and 7 that have been removed completely. Right now the only people who can play games are people with ranks and the select few others. This will make other people leave Avicus and play on other servers, and creates a major problem, any fixes?
body_tagged: Has anyone else noticed that lately especially on the weekends, there haven't been enough nebula servers to cope with demand. This will make other people leave Avicus and play on other servers, and creates a major problem, any fixes?
title: Lack of servers up :(

replies.body: Nebula isn't the only GameMode on Avicus...

replies.body: Buy you a rank and help to keep the server running and get the perk of joining full servers and teams.

replies.body: Ya but a lot of people cant buy the rank (in my case my parents wouldn't let me) and they don't like the other gamemodes so they go to other servers with a better variety of gamemodes.

replies.body: Best thing that has ever happened to avicus. You guys say that nebula is the only gamemode yet you have NEVER EVEN TRIED THE OTHER GAMEMODES.
replies.body_tagged: Best thing that has ever happened to avicus. You guys say that nebula is the only gamemode yet you have NEVER EVEN TRIED THE OTHER GAMEMODES.

replies.body: I have and I would rather do parkour or hunger games then those.

replies.body:
I will try and bring this up with the other staff, but think of the positives in this situation:

If you cannot join the gamemode you desire,try other gamemodes! I used to only play Nebula, but my friend persuaded me into playing Walls with him and it was great.

Donate for a rank. Before I begin, I don't want to force you in any way. Donating for a rank means you're helping the server out and you get lots of great perks, including exp boost, kits, and joining full games (;p)

Donate for a rank. Before I begin, I don't want to force you in any way. Donating for a rank means you're helping the server out and you get lots of great perks, including exp boost, kits, and joining full games (;p)

replies.body:
Some people can't donate and that is a problem for many Avicus players when it comes to full games. Although I don't really have a solution you can either: Spectate good players and learn things until the next game, or you can hold down tab, and when you see a player leave immediately do ./join.

That is what I do.
replies.body_tagged:

That is what I do.

replies.body:
Thanks for the help MidnightBeats, but as i said before, i would rather play hunger games or do parkour then the other gamemodes, and my parents won't let me donate. :(
And miningflamingo, the problem with that is that this morning the servers were all like 39/30, 57/50, or even 44/30, so I would have to wait for lots of people to leave, and that takes forever.

replies.body: I agree....There are a lot of servers down and sometimes I cant join...   :/     I currently don't have any money to donate, so that's out of the question (at least for now), and I've tried all other gamemodes...and I don't enjoy them that much.....the only thing I haven't tried is Avicade, because whenever Im on, no-one else is playing it....
